summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the functionality of the database handler used for managing simulation data, covering operations such as adding and copying parameters, exporting files, version retrieval, collection queries, derived value extraction, configuration parameter access, file insertion, model version handling, cache key generation, and reading various database tables. The suite also includes helper utilities for cleanup, sandbox management, and random identifier generation.
business_intent: To ensure the correctness and robustness of the database layer that stores and retrieves simulation configurations and results for the CTA simulation framework, thereby supporting reliable data management, version control, and parameter handling in scientific workflows.
